content: super simple crochet coaster that can be made smaller to be a face scrubbie or with a fun yarn to be a dollhouse rug materials - 8-10g or 20-25 yds worsted weight yarn - us 8 or 5 mm crochet hook *printer friendly version does not have photos* *pattern is not tested* *you may sell items made from the pattern but the pattern itself may not be resold for pattern credit super easy crochet coaster by maison mendoza * if you have instagram please tag me @maison de maison or #maisondemaisonshop
